scripts.clean: npx rimraf dist && npx rimraf src/OVE.Service.AssetManager/bin && npx rimraf src/OVE.Service.AssetManager/obj
scripts.build: dotnet restore src/OVE.Service.AssetManager && dotnet build src/OVE.Service.AssetManager && dotnet publish src/OVE.Service.AssetManager -o ../../dist
scripts.build:alpine: dotnet restore src/OVE.Service.AssetManager && dotnet build src/OVE.Service.AssetManager && dotnet publish src/OVE.Service.AssetManager -o ../../dist --runtime alpine.3.7-x64
